name: PyPIPublisher
description: Create and upload an sdist or wheel to a PyPI-compatible index using Twine.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: PyPI connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: A generic service endpoint for connecting to the package index.

inputs.name: wd
inputs.label: Python package directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory of the Python package to be created and published, where setup.py is present.

inputs.name: wheel
inputs.label: Also publish a wheel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select whether to create and publish a universal wheel package (platform independent) in addition to an sdist package. [More information](https://packaging.python.org/tutorials/distributing-packages/#wheels).
